meanings.sent1: Some boneheads believe everything they read online.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those boneheads; they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The boneheads at the party kept telling the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent4: The boneheads in the movie made the audience laugh with their silly antics.
meanings.sent5: The group of boneheads were always getting into trouble together.

meanings.definition: A person who lacks intelligence or common sense.
meanings.sent1: The boneheads forgot their umbrellas on a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe those boneheads tried to fix the car without any tools.
meanings.sent3: The boneheads at the office always mix up their paperwork.
meanings.sent4: The boneheads in the story never learn from their mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The group of boneheads managed to get lost in their own neighborhood.
